name: @dynamic-forms/common
author: dynamic-forms
description: dynamic-forms is an Angular project for dynamic forms based on JSON.

scripts.build:core: ng build dynamic-forms-core && npm run copy:styles:core
scripts.build:bootstrap: ng build dynamic-forms-bootstrap && npm run copy:styles:bootstrap
scripts.build:material: ng build dynamic-forms-material && npm run copy:styles:material
scripts.build:libs: npm run build:core && npm run build:bootstrap && npm run build:material
scripts.cover:libs: npm run cover:core && npm run cover:bootstrap && npm run cover:material
scripts.doc:libs: npm run doc:core && npm run doc:bootstrap && npm run doc:material
scripts.build:localhost: npm run lint && npm run build:libs && npm run cover:libs && npm run doc:libs && npm run build:demo -- --base-href=/v8/
scripts.build:localhost:prod: npm run lint && npm run build:libs && npm run cover:libs && npm run doc:libs && npm run build:demo:prod -- --base-href=/v8/
scripts.publish:libs: npm run publish:core && npm run publish:bootstrap && npm run publish:material
scripts.clean:styles:libs: npm run clean:styles:core && npm run clean:styles:bootstrap && npm run clean:styles:material
scripts.copy:styles:core: npm run clean:styles:core && cd libs/core/assets && copyfiles "./**/*.scss" ../../../dist/v8/@dynamic-forms/core/assets
scripts.copy:styles:bootstrap: npm run clean:styles:bootstrap && cd libs/bootstrap/assets && copyfiles "./**/*.scss" ../../../dist/v8/@dynamic-forms/bootstrap/assets
scripts.copy:styles:material: npm run clean:styles:material && cd libs/material/assets && copyfiles "./**/*.scss" ../../../dist/v8/@dynamic-forms/material/assets
scripts.copy:styles:libs: npm run copy:styles:core && npm run copy:styles:bootstrap && npm run copy:styles:material
